"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558865d963687210d7000189#post_558865d963687210d7000189
Here's my personal opinion on why people complain about this shit:
Cause if androids exist then that's a real threat to assholes' chances of reproduction.

Right now one of the biggest changes going on in the usa is that people abortions, divorces and people marrying out of wedlock are going down because people are waiting till they're older to marry and have kids.

That's why you see assholes trying to convince others that they don't "need" a condom or birth control, cause they want to get pregnant/get someone pregnant for pressure the person into marrying them out of wedlock.


My guess is that when we do develop androids birth rates and that will eventually level out, but the biggest effect it will have is that it will push the dirtbags of society out of the genepool in only a generation.

Tl:dr; if marrying out of wedlock becomes unheard of then chances are the shitbags of the world will be pushed completely out of the genepool in only a generation.
